name: Browning & Associates (trading as Browning Environmental)
goal:
Browning Environmental is a communications consultancy specialising in the environment.

We work with NGOs, Governments and companies to promote environmental services or initiatives all over the world.

We operate globally, with teams of experienced environmental communicators with advertising, digital and PR backgrounds, working together with specialists from the environmental sciences. Our activities are co-ordinated from offices in London, Brussels, and Bonn, and the network of consultants is active in dozens of countries worldwide.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation
